selected_quotes: This is great. Why didn't *I* think of this!

citation.title: Haptics: Generating and Perceiving Tangible Sensations

wikipedia.title: Affective haptics
wikipedia.summary: Affective haptics is the emerging area of research which focuses on the study and design of devices and systems that can elicit, enhance, or influence the emotional state of a human by means of sense of touch.

author.name: Gavin Buckingham
author.description: Perception and action researcher examining weight illusions, fingertip force control, and motor learning during object lifting. University of Exeter.

author.name: Shravan Vasishth
author.description:
Probabilities are for weaklings. I deal in certainty.

My review of the Sheffield MSc in Statistics: http://bit.ly/statsreview
